title: Peter Luff – 2011 Speech to the Royal Corps of Naval Constructors
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by the Minister for Defence Equipment, Support and Technology, Peter Luff, made at SS Great Britain in Bristol on Thursday 19th May 2011.
